name: ax-pow
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wex(s0, wal(s1, wi(wal(s2, wi(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s0)))))
comment: Axiom of Power Sets. An axiom of Zermelo-Fraenkel set theory. It states that a set ` y ` exists that includes the power set of a given set ` x ` i.e. contains every subset of ` x ` . The variant ~ axpow2 uses explicit subset notation. A version using class notation is ~ pwex . (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)
